references.paper_title: Image to sphere: Learning equivariant features for efficient pose prediction

references.paper_title: Implicit-pdf: Non-parametric representation of probability distributions on the rotation manifold
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of non-parametric distribution modeling on SO(3), which the current work extends by incorporating a frequency-domain regression loss.

references.paper_title: Equivariant single view pose prediction via induced and restriction representations
references.reason: This work proposes an SO(3)-equivariant network for pose estimation which the current work leverages to build an SO(3)-equivariant pose harmonics regression network.

references.paper_title: On the continuity of rotation representations in neural networks
references.reason: This paper highlights the limitations of spatial-domain rotation representations, motivating the shift to a frequency-domain approach in the current work.
